result.execSummary:
The defendant Bryan C. McBain was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Issue of Worthless Checks(<=$2500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.24(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Conditions:

Attend, pay for, and successfully complete any programming ordered by the agent.

Pay costs of supervision.  Court costs have been remitted by the Court.

Pay restitution within the first seven months of probation - $60 to Bud's Bar and $250 to Bunker Hill.  Defendant may be released from probation once restitution is paid in full but no sooner than six months.
Concurrent with: 15CM143

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bryan C. McBain

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Judgment/Notice of Judgment & Petition for Civil Judgment for Restitution (Budz Bar) - No Mail Receptacle, Unable to Forward - No new address found, Unable to resend
Judgment/Notice of Judgment & Petition for Civil Judgment for Restitution (Bud's Bar) - No Mail Receptacle, Unable to Forward - Found different address, Attempting to resend
as requested by Probation and Parole

Defendant Bryan C. McBain in court with attorney Lisa A McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Cases 15CM172, 15CM147, 15CM143, and 15CM146 called together.  DA informs Court that the parties have an agreement for resolution calling for DRI of 15CM172 and 15CM147 and def's plea to counts 1 in each 15CM143 and 15CM146 for DRI of counts 2 and 3 in 15CM143.  Def pleads no contest to count 1/worthless checks in 15CM143 and count 1/worthless checks in 15CM146.  Court's colloquy on pleas.  Finding of guilty.

Sentence:  15CM143:  Count 1 - 2 years probation with conditions of attend, pay for, and successfully complete any programming ordered by the agent; costs; restitution within first 7 months in amount of $390 to D & Z's One Stop.  Def may be released from probation once restitution is paid in full but no sooner than 6 months.

15CM146 - sentence withheld for 2 years probation with same conditions re programming.  Restitution:  $250 to Bunker Hill within the first 7 months of probation and $60 to Bud's Bar within the first 7 months of probation.  Same deal re release from probation if restitution paid, but no release sooner than 6 months.  Costs in this case remitted by the Court.

Remaining counts and cases 15CM172 and 15CM147 dismissed and read in.

Defendant Bryan C Mc Bain in court with attorney Lisa A McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  4 cases called together for adjourned initial:  15CM172, 15CM146, 15CM147, and 15CM143.  Court asks for def's pleas in these matters:  NG pleas entered in all cases, charges having been stated on the record.  DA states that the parties have these matters resolved but are not ready to proceed to disposition now as agreement requires def's upfront payment of significant $; asks for 6/1 resolution date.  Status conference scheduled for June 1, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Bryan C Mc Bain in court. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  15CM172, 15CM146, 15CM147, and 15CM143 called together for adjourned initial.  Court has instructs def to contact SPD re eligibility and report back to the Court his findings.  Matters adj. to 2/3 at 10.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for February 3, 2016 at 10:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Bryan C. McBain
Current: 28948 Rabine Lane, Lone Rock, WI 53556 United States  (Effective: 11-30-2015)
Prior: 1043 N. Park St., Richland Center, WI 53581 United States

Defendant Bryan C Mc Bain in court. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  4 cases called together, all for adjourned initial appearance:  15CM143, 146, 147, and 172.  Def states he does not qualify for public defender; requests consideration for court-appointed counsel.  Court questions def to determine eligibility.  Def waives right to counsel for the sole, limited purpose of offer exchange with the State.  Court accepts waiver and notes that def is on the line for Dean counsel eligibility; will consider that further at another court date after offer exchange has occurred.  Court adjourns these matters to Dec. 16th at 9. Def asks for review of cash bond amount in 15CM172.  Court admits def to $2k signature bond and directs clerk to release the $1250 cash.  Def states cash belongs to TV.  Clerk requests address and phone number info from TV so that the record on posting can be changed and the money returned to TV.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for December 16, 2015 at 09:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Bryan C. McBain
Current: 1043 N. Park St., Richland Center, WI 53581 United States  (Effective: 09-03-2015)
Prior: 480 E. Tenth Street, Richland Center, WI 53581
Defendant is to be fingerprinted prior to leaving the courthouse.
Def in person without counsel. DA Harper for the State. Court informs def of the charges/max possible penalties as well as right to counsel. DA Harper requests matters be setover to another date.
